item.title: Air pollution: ozone layer protection, base year for the allocation of quotas of hydrochlorofluorocarbons HCFCs for the Member States that acceded on May 2004 (amend. Regulation (EC) No 2037/2000)
Animal diseases and public health: prevention and control of transmissible spongiform encephalopathies TSEs (amend. Regulation (EC) No 999/2001)
Visa Information System VIS: exchange of data on Schengen short-stay visas including the national long-stay visas which are concurrently valid as short-stay visas

Social security: employed and self-employed persons, members of their families moving within the Community (amend. Regulations (EEC) No 1408/71 and (EEC) No 574/72), changes in national legislations since the end of accession negotiations

Pharmaceutical products: compulsory licensing of patents relating to the manufacture of pharmaceutical products for export to countries with public health problems

Judicial cooperation in civil and commercial matters: resolution of disputes by use of mediation
Port services: market access and financing of maritime ports
Further European cooperation in quality assurance in higher education

Investment firms and credit institutions: capital adequacy. Recast
Instrument for Stability

Public access to environmental information: European Pollutant Release and Transfer Register
Credit institutions: taking up and pursuit of the business. Recast

Organisation of working time
Industrial property: legal protection of designs

Public access to information: legal framework for an infrastructure for spatial information in Europe (INSPIRE) specially for monitoring environmental policy
Action in the field of culture: Culture 2007 programme (2007-2013)
Life long learning: integrated action programme comprising Comenius, Erasmus, Leonardo da Vinci and Grundtvig programmes and the Jean Monnet programme

Programme Marco Polo II (2007-2013), financial assistance to improve the environmental peformance of freight transport
Employment and social cohesion: programme Progress for employment and social solidarity, 2007-2013
Cross-border cooperation, economic and social cohesion: European Grouping of Territorial Cooperation (EGTC)
Audiovisual sector: implementation of a programme of support for this European sector, MEDIA 2007
Economic and social cohesion: European Social Fund ESF for employment, social inclusion, training and education, 2007-2013 (repeal. Regulation (EC) No 1784/1999)
Satellite navigation programmes EGNOS and Galileo: implementation of the deployment and commercial operating phases 2008-2013. GNSS Regulation

Regional policy: European Regional Development Fund ERDF (repeal. Regulation (EC) No 1783/1999)

Foodstuffs intended for particular nutritional uses (repeal. Directive 89/398/EC). Codification

European order for payment procedure
Scientific research: admission of third-country national researchers to the Community, uniform visas
Internet: 2005-2008 action programme on promoting a safer use, Safer Internet plus.
